title: (IMP) There has been recent wave of blackmailing through AI generated images
selftext:
There has been a lot of victims of a ai which i would not take name of, the ai takes your picture and converts it into a inappropriate and vulgar image, people are using this to blackmail females
One of my mutuals even fell victim to it
This is more serious as most of the criminals are probably underage and the ai is easily accessible while the conclusions can be very serious while parents might thing there kid was sharing private images.
I request everyone to spread awareness about it, i am trying my best as well

Regards
Yaminokirito

source:

[evil ai](https://futurism.com/the-byte/ai-generating-child-sex-abuse-images)
comments: Those who know about AI , will be the one able to differentiate between real and Ai image. Since AI power  is mostly unknown to majority , most will belive ai image as real
